project.name: Kuali Coeus
project.description: The Kuali Coeus (KC) project is building a comprehensive system to manage the complexities of research administration that fully addresses the needs from the faculty researcher through grants administration to federal funding agencies. KC is using MITâ€™s proven COEUS system as its baseline design, filling in missing functionality from COEUS, and updating its technical architecture for vendor independence and easier integration with other administration systems.

requirePluginVersions.message: Best Practice is to always define plugin versions!
